nodes.text: "Tojo" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served the Galactic Republic as a clone trooper in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. A member of the 1st Platoon, Tojo became a mercenary operating on Saleucami during the Galactic Civil War. Tojo was level-headed and stable under fire.

Tojo was one of the millions of clone troopers created on the aquatic planet of Kamino for the Grand Army of the Republic, being trained for years as a standard trooper. During the Clone Wars, Tojo served as a rank-and-file member of the 1st Platoon before being retired by the Galactic Empire from active duty. Making off with caches of armor and weaponry, Tojo and other platoon members fled to the Outer Rim where they operated as a mercenary group. Basing their operations on Saleucami within Blackwind Crater, Tojo and the Platoon were hired as the long-term guards of the Veiled Sorority's base of operations in the crater. Because of the accelerated age of the clone army, Tojo was physically closer to the age of seventy or eighty then to his chronological age of forty. Carrying a blaster rifle, vibroknife, and worn armor; all standard issue from their time in the Grand Army, Tojo had a diminished memory. By the time of the Sorority's conflict with the Zann Consortium, only four others were still alive out of the original twenty-seven troopers that survived the Clone Wars. Tojo was joined by Zeke, Oake, Jayk, and Rafe.
